trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around November 15th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI go to a.maceo smith high school in Oak Cliff in 3030 Stag Road it was wensday after school 3:45 that's the time school get's out Right when the bell ring I went stright into the bus doing at that time I've been reading lot's of books about ufos the subject about aliens ufos and unexplained phenomena was always on my mind at the time I could not stop thinking about so I researched it All early that week and so after school As I Rode the bus not talking to any of my friends reading mysteries,legends And unexplained phenomena by LINDA S.GODFREY and Consulting Editor :ROSEMARY Ellen Guiley As I was rideing The bus around 3:52 I saw A large 30 foot long cigar shape object standing still over a contrion yard near my house no one sees but me As the bus makes a left turn the object starts to move it makes A 30 degree turn and then it starts to follow the bus by 30 feet beside the bus and 10 foot up passeing over houses keeping up with the bus I was seting on the right side of the bus as I was obseving it I turned to my left to see if anyone else is seeing what I'im seeing most of the other kids were sleep and some listening to music a sleep and I turn around to see if one of my friends seting behind me is looking too He was awake looking forward at the bus he rolls his eye at me with no expession at all and contunes to look foward I turn back my attention to the object still move with the bus until the bus makes a another left turn the object then disappers into the woods over large trees I then look in amazement at my friend behind me and say did you see that He replies saying what!? I just said nevermind As I got off the bus I looked at the clock on the bus it was 4:08 then without saying anything to my friend who got off too I went stright home As I can see forward my mom"s home I checked the mailbox then looked into the sky when A Disc shape object which I did not see coming glided 5 feet over my head then I blacked out wakeing up seeing me with the mail in my hand I then walked into the porch fast and hit the door bill my dad opened the door and chris where have you been over a friend's house I then what are doing here dad he then said what you talking about chris i just came from work I turned around fast to see my dad"s truck behind me and then I ran and looked at the time in the kitchen then I ran and looked at the clock on the tv in the living room my mom was watching looking like what"s going on I explained to them what I've Experineced my father seemed like He belived me my mom was skptical that night I was sleeping until awoken up to two reptilion like creatures that stood up right in my room they were about 8-9 feet tall bipdal with large tails behind them I looked at my clock it was 2:02 I then to my dog socks whom was still a sleep not moveing at all I was not a Afriad at all then blacked out having vived dreams about being on a ship seting on a large table there was more reptilion like creatures one in purticlar told me not to be afriad mently in my mind then started to tell me about who I was secetly and that i was the important human to them and told me my future on what"s who I become they told me that I would become they then took me into a elvator like room next to me was a large window showing the aliens and spaceship on the ground I then could tell I was on another planet the sky "s were orange like it looked more like mars then I turned around and the door to the elvator door opened a bright light flash and then awoken up in my bed thinking to my self that was weird I then got ready for school that"s my first enconter of aliens i"ve always belived in ufos I"ve always had a open mind about things I think its pretty cool that I"ve come a cross this.
